# 术数上册

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shushu-shang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shushu-shang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shushu-shang
shushu-shang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shushu-shang
shushu-shang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
